decks.notes: The deck aims to ramp up quickly and efficiently using cards like Exploration, Burgeoning, and Lotus Cobra to accelerate mana production. With a focus on land-based ramp, the deck can quickly cast its commander, Lumra, Bellow of the Woods, to apply pressure on the opponent with its aggressive abilities. The deck also includes powerful utility lands like Maze of Ith and Glacial Chasm to provide protection and longevity in the game. Using cards like Primeval Titan and Sylvan Library for card advantage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and efficient spells, ultimately securing victory through a combination of aggression and resource management.

The deck is designed to control the game by using a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw effects to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect its own win condition. With Elminster as the commander, the deck focuses on utilizing powerful control spells such as Counterspell, Day of Judgment, and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria to dominate the battlefield and outmaneuver the opponent. By constantly interacting with the opponent's plays and controlling the pace of the game, the deck seeks to establish board control and eventually grind out a win through attrition. The inclusion of versatile cards like Snapcaster Mage and Ponder allows for flexibility in finding the right answers at the right time.

The main idea of this deck is to use Marath, Will of the Wild as the commander to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The deck includes a variety of mana dorks and ramp spells to quickly get Marath onto the battlefield and start generating value. There are also a number of efficient removal spells and combat tricks to deal with opposing threats and maintain board control. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature aggression and powerful spells while also having access to a diverse range of abilities to adapt to different game situations. Overall, the deck focuses on a proactive playstyle and aims to win through quick and aggressive creature-based strategies.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by utilizing the synergy between Slimefoot and Squee to generate a constant stream of creature tokens and damage. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures and removal spells to control the board and disrupt opponents' strategies. With cards like Birthing Pod and Survival of the Fittest, the deck can tutor for specific creatures to adapt to different situations and apply pressure on opponents. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Goblin Bombardment and Skullclamp allows for value generation and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of threats and apply consistent pressure to secure victories in one-on-one duels.

The deck focuses on an aggressive strategy centered around the commander, Deadpool, Trading Card. It includes a mix of powerful creatures, removal spells, and disruptive cards to maintain pressure on the opponent and control the tempo of the game. With a low mana curve and efficient threats, the deck aims to attack early and often, applying pressure and forcing the opponent to react quickly. By combining speed and disruption, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory before they can stabilize or mount a counterattack. The key concept is to consistently apply pressure, disrupt the opponent's game plan, and secure a swift victory through aggressive plays and efficient resource management.

The key concept of this deck revolves around leveraging Lier, Disciple of the Drowned's ability to reduce the cost of instant and sorcery spells from the graveyard. The deck focuses on a high density of cheap, efficient spells to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By utilizing counterspells, card draw, and bounce effects, the deck aims to out-value the opponent and maintain control of the battlefield. The inclusion of cards like High Tide and Extraplanar Lens also allows for explosive mana generation to cast multiple spells in a single turn. The overall strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells while keeping them on the back foot with disruptive tactics and incremental advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board through a combination of efficient creature removal, disruptive creatures, and powerful equipment. Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd serves as the commander, providing a strong aggro element to the deck. Cards like Swords to Plowshares, Palace Jailer, and Skyclave Apparition help in dealing with threats on the board, while creatures like Mother of Runes and Giver of Runes protect important pieces. Equipment like Umezawa's Jitte and Shadowspear provide additional power and utility to the creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building up its own board presence to quickly close out the game.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The deck utilizes the synergy between Slimefoot and Squee to create a steady stream of token creatures while also providing sacrifice outlets like Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Abrupt Decay and Fatal Push while ramping up quickly with mana dorks like Birds of Paradise and Elves of Deep Shadow. Additionally, the deck includes powerful cards like Demonic Tutor and Survival of the Fittest to search for key pieces and maintain card advantage. With a mix of token generation, removal, and efficient creatures, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this deck is to maintain aggressive pressure on the opponent by utilizing a combination of efficient creatures, powerful spells, and disruptive abilities. Aragorn, King of Gondor serves as the commander, providing a strong and versatile leader for the deck. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures like Cathar Commando and Kutzil's Flanker, along with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt to control the board and deal with threats. Counterspells such as Mana Leak and Force of Negation help protect your own creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the goal is to apply pressure early and consistently to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Phelia's abilities to create a fast and aggressive strategy. It includes a mix of powerful creatures, disruptive spells, and equipment to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent quickly. The deck also incorporates various ways to protect Phelia and other key creatures, such as Mother of Runes and Giver of Runes. The inclusion of cards like Swords to Plowshares and Path to Exile helps deal with threats efficiently. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures, disruption, and protection, aiming to secure victory through quick and decisive plays.

This deck focuses on fast-paced aggressive play by utilizing a combination of black, red, and green cards to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The commanders, Ikra Shidiqi and Rograkh, work together to establish a strong board presence and deal damage efficiently. The deck includes a variety of low-cost spells and creatures to maintain pressure on the opponent while also providing options for disruption and removal. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Demonic Tutor, Tainted Pact, and Yawgmoth's Will allows for consistency and flexibility in finding key pieces to secure victory. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around speed, aggression, and resource management to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a fast-paced one-on-one duel.

The deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy, utilizing a variety of creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The commander, Satya, Aetherflux Genius, provides additional card advantage and synergy with the rest of the deck. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, there are several disruptive spells such as Force of Negation and Stifle to control the game and prevent the opponent from executing their game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure a smooth curve of spells throughout the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing the abilities of Slimefoot and Squee to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures, removal spells, and ramp spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Skullclamp to take advantage of sacrificing creatures for additional value. The deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain a steady stream of threats to keep them on the back foot. With access to powerful cards like Demonic Tutor and Survival of the Fittest, the deck can consistently find its key pieces and close out games efficiently.

This deck focuses on utilizing Spider-Man 2099 as the commander to create an aggro strategy that overwhelms opponents with efficient creatures and powerful instants and sorceries. The key strategy revolves around quickly developing a board presence with cards like Brazen Borrower, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and True-Name Nemesis, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Force of Negation and Mana Leak. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Pyrokinesis to help finish off opponents. Additionally, the deck has strong card advantage and selection tools like Brainstorm, Preordain, and Snapcaster Mage to ensure that resources are constantly replenished.

The key concept of this Spider-Man 2099 Aggro deck is to control the board and disrupt your opponent's strategy with a mix of versatile spells and efficient creatures. By utilizing cards like Counterspell, Lightning Bolt, and Memory Lapse, you can interfere with your opponent's game plan while deploying threats like Murktide Regent and Detective's Phoenix to apply pressure. The deck also includes card draw spells like Brainstorm and Expressive Iteration to maintain card advantage and find key pieces. With a mana base that includes dual lands like Volcanic Island and fetch lands like Scalding Tarn, you can ensure consistent access to the colors you need to cast your spells efficiently and stay ahead in the game.

This deck focuses on fast-paced aggressive gameplay using the synergy between the partner commanders, Kraum and Yoshimaru. It utilizes a mix of powerful creatures, burn spells, equipment, and support cards to quickly overwhelm opponents and apply pressure early in the game. The deck includes a range of combat tricks, removal spells, and disruptive elements to control the board and maintain a strong presence. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy with a mix of dual lands, fetch lands, and utility lands. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to establish a strong board presence, apply pressure with aggressive threats, and disrupt opponents' strategies to secure a victory in the 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with Aragorn, King of Gondor as the commander. It includes cards that provide removal, disruption, and protection, allowing the player to control the battlefield and push for damage. The deck is designed to quickly establish a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and spells. It includes a mix of versatile threats and answers to handle a variety of situations, ensuring a proactive game plan. By leveraging Aragorn's abilities and the powerful cards in the deck, the player aims to apply pressure early and maintain momentum throughout the game to secure victory in a fast-paced Duel Commander format.

The deck revolves around the aggressive playstyle of Aragorn, King of Gondor, utilizing a mix of powerful creatures and control spells to dominate the battlefield. The deck features a combination of versatile threats such as True-Name Nemesis and Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel, alongside strong removal like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt. It also includes various counterspells like Force of Negation and Mana Leak to protect its creatures and disrupt opponents' strategies. The mana base is carefully constructed with a mix of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors. Overall, the deck aims to pressure opponents with its aggressive creatures while maintaining control of the game with its disruptive spells.

The deck revolves around Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander, focusing on an aggressive playstyle. It includes a wide array of creatures and spells that can quickly put pressure on opponents and control the battlefield. With cards like Spectacular Spider-Man, City of Traitors, and Masterwork of Ingenuity, the deck aims to quickly establish board presence and disrupt opponents' strategies. The inclusion of powerful equipment such as Sword of Feast and Famine and Umezawa's Jitte enhances the aggression of the deck, while protective spells like Mother of Runes and Giver of Runes help keep important creatures alive. Overall, the deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with a combination of speed, disruption, and powerful threats.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing the powerful abilities of the Deadpool, Trading Card commander. The deck focuses on a combination of direct damage spells, efficient creatures, and disruptive cards to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It aims to control the battlefield with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Hymn to Tourach, while also dealing damage with cards like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning. By using cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and City of Traitors, the deck can maintain a strong presence on the board and apply pressure to the opponent. Overall, the key strategy is to be proactive, resourceful, and relentless in pursuing victory.

The deck revolves around reanimating powerful creatures quickly, disrupting the opponent's hand and board with efficient removal and disruption spells, and utilizing the graveyard as a resource. By combining a mix of control elements with aggressive threats, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan. Emet-Selch, Unsundered serves as the commander, providing recursion and card advantage to fuel the deck's game plan. The key strategy is to quickly assemble powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty, disrupt the opponent's plans with cards like Thoughtseize and Daze, and close out the game with a combination of aggro creatures and devastating spells like Tendrils of Agony.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells and disruption while generating mana advantage with cards like High Tide and Extraplanar Lens. The goal is to out-tempo the opponent by playing a mix of cheap interaction and card selection spells to find the most efficient answers. Lier, Disciple of the Drowned allows for recursion of key spells from the graveyard, providing extra value and resilience against opposing threats. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan with cards like Exhaustion and Engulf the Shore, ultimately setting up for a powerful finish with cards like Brain Freeze or a big Brainstorm. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up for a strong finish with spells that can win the game on the spot.

The deck revolves around utilizing lands and ramp spells to quickly build up a strong mana base and accelerate into powerful threats. By focusing on early mana acceleration and land ramp, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big creatures and powerful spells ahead of schedule. Lumra, Bellow of the Woods serves as the commander, providing additional synergy with land-focused strategies. The deck also includes disruptive elements such as Beast Within and Thought-Knot Seer to disrupt opponents' game plans. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to leverage lands and mana ramp to quickly establish a dominant board presence and pressure opponents with efficient threats.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to apply pressure on the opponent. By combining cards that provide strong creatures like Ardyn, the Usurper and Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur with spells like Thoughtseize and Force Spike, the deck aims to control the game while constantly threatening the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Animate Dead and Necromancy allows for recursion of powerful creatures, ensuring a steady stream of threats. The deck also features a versatile mana base to support its various color requirements and maximize efficiency. Overall, the deck focuses on establishing early dominance and maintaining momentum to secure victory in 1 vs 1 matchups.

The deck is focused on utilizing a wide range of mana acceleration and creature tutoring to generate a fast and aggressive board presence. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with early threats and efficient creature interactions, while also utilizing support cards like removal spells and protective creatures to maintain control of the battlefield. The inclusion of powerful cards like Birthing Pod, Green Sun's Zenith, and Eldritch Evolution allow for flexible and powerful plays, ensuring that the deck can adapt to different situations and outpace opponents. By combining efficient mana ramp, creature tutoring, and disruptive elements, the deck looks to press its advantage and close out the game quickly through aggressive creature beats and combo potential.

This deck focuses on playing a fast-paced aggressive strategy with Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd as the commander. It includes a variety of low-cost creatures and disruptive spells to apply early pressure on opponents. The deck also utilizes cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Umezawa's Jitte to enhance combat abilities and gain incremental advantages. The inclusion of powerful removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Oust helps to keep the opponent's board in check, allowing for a smoother path to victory. Additionally, cards like Palace Jailer and Parallax Wave provide additional value by controlling the battlefield and generating card advantage. Overall, the goal of this deck is to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures and disruptive plays to secure a quick win.

This deck focuses on utilizing the partners Ravos and Thrasios to create a synergistic aggro strategy. The deck contains a wide variety of efficient creatures, mana dorks, and tutors to consistently apply pressure on the opponent. It also includes powerful disruption cards like Opposition Agent and Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck is built to be proactive and versatile, capable of adapting to different matchups and board states. By combining the strengths of both partners and leveraging a diverse array of cards, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and resilient aggro strategy while maintaining the ability to control the game when necessary.

The focus of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive playstyle utilizing the abilities of Slimefoot and Squee as the commanders. The deck is designed to quickly swarm the battlefield with creatures and deal direct damage to the opponent. Cards like Goblin Bombardment and Skullclamp are used to maximize the value of sacrificing creatures, while cards like Tarmogoyf and Frenzied Baloth provide strong attackers. The deck also includes a variety of disruption cards like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay to control the opponent's strategy. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless onslaught of creatures while maintaining control of the battlefield.

The deck focuses on utilizing the synergy between Slimefoot and Squee to create a fast and aggressive gameplay style. It includes a variety of low-cost creatures and spells to generate tokens and apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also features cards that allow for recursion and card advantage, such as Goblin Bombardment and Survival of the Fittest. Additionally, the deck includes a strong mana base to ensure consistent plays and enable early aggression. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a continuous stream of creatures and removal spells while generating value from Slimefoot's abilities to maintain board presence and close out the game quickly.

mainboard.name: Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose

decks.notes: The deck is focused on aggressive gameplay with Sorin of House Markov as the commander. It includes a mix of powerful creatures, removal spells, and tutor effects to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck utilizes a combination of low-cost creatures and efficient removal spells to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also includes cards that provide additional value and resilience, such as lifegain effects and protection spells. Overall, the deck aims to establish an aggressive board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The Spider-Man 2099 Aggro deck focuses on utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm and outpace the opponent in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format. The deck includes a wide range of low-cost spells such as Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, and Fiery Confluence to deal damage early on, while also incorporating countermagic like Counterspell and Cryptic Command to disrupt the opponent's plans. With a strong mana base and card selection tools like Ponder and Brainstorm, the deck aims to maintain tempo and pressure throughout the game, ultimately leading to a swift victory through a combination of direct damage and board control.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to disrupt the opponent's strategy and maintain board control. Tivit, Seller of Secrets serves as the commander, providing card advantage and a win condition with its ability to mill the opponent's library. The deck includes a variety of lands to ensure consistent mana sources and access to different colors of mana. Cards like Counterspell, Cryptic Command, and Force of Negation are used to counter threats, while removal spells like Fatal Push and Swords to Plowshares deal with opposing creatures. Card draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder help maintain card advantage, while powerful sorceries like Demonic Tutor and Toxic Deluge provide additional answers to the opponent's threats.
